title: WHIRLING F3 / BARRED DOOR INSIDE
description: From the inside, the door opens easily.

dialogueTree.title: Barred Door: "This is the barred door you tried t..."
dialogueTree.text: This is the barred door you tried to kick in before.

dialogueTree.title: Barred Door: "This is the inside of the barred do..."
dialogueTree.text: This is the inside of the barred door you've seen before.

dialogueTree.title: Barred Door: "The door is small but heavy-looking..."
dialogueTree.text: The door is small but heavy-looking. It's barred from the inside.

links.title: You: "Lightly punch the door once more. J..."
links.text: Lightly punch the door once more. Just in case.

links.title: Barred Door: "The door shudders a bit, as though..."
links.text: The door shudders a bit, as though it were laughing at you.

links.title: You: ""So what's on the other side?""
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Unless we've veered off into a fol..."
links.text: "Unless we've veered off into a folded M dimension, I'm expecting to step out on the roof."

links.title: Conceptualization: "Folded M dimension. A reference to..."
links.text: Folded M dimension. A reference to the popular science fiction series *In System*. Look who's in a good mood suddenly (and reads science fiction).

links.title: Inland Empire: "Yes. It *is* quite likely that we w..."
links.text: Yes. It *is* quite likely that we will re-emerge on the M-Plain. Brace for psychokinetic impact. (Or the roof.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Unless we've veered off into a fol..."
links.text: "Unless we've veered off into a folded M dimension, I'm expecting to step out on the roof -- we could ask Klaasje about this route, see how she reacts?"
